title: 23 Fabulous Felines With Unique and Rare Fur Patterns and Markings
description: One of our favorite things about cats is that each and every one of them is unique. Black cats are meowgical. They are agents of darkness. They cause mischief like no one else. Ginger cats have one braincell to share between all of them, and although most days, they will just be silly little dudes and dudettes, sometimes, they will blind you with their brilliance. Sphynx cats look like angry old men, and they act like it as well. Don't ask us to explain how. They just do. So, what happens if you take these colors and mix them up? What happens if you throw some brown onto a black cat? What happens if a cat is born a chimera - half black and half ginger? We don't know exactly what happens, but we do know that these unique and rare cats are incredibly beautiful and intriguing. So, we have put together a list of some of the coolest, rarest cats that we have ever seen, and really, it's anyone's guess how much chaos they cause on a daily basis, but we would bet that it's a whole lot.
author: Mariel Ruvinsky
excerpt: 23 Fabulous Felines With Unique and Rare Fur Patterns and Markings - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: We don't mean to alarm you - whoever this cat belongs to - but we think that you have a little burglar in your house. Do not be surprised if random items start disappearing from your grocery bags. This kitty has warned you as much as it is possible for a kitty to do so. There is a burglar mask on her face.  Mesmerizing. We don't know how we would be able to get anything done around the house with this meowjestic king walking around the place. We'd tell him to get on the bed so that we could wash the floor, he would say no, and we would be doomed to dirty floors for eternity because we would be unable to refuse him.
html:
We don't mean to alarm you - whoever this cat belongs to - but we think that you have a little burglar in your house. Do not be surprised if random items start disappearing from your grocery bags. This kitty has warned you as much as it is possible for a kitty to do so. There is a burglar mask on her face. 

Mesmerizing. We don't know how we would be able to get anything done around the house with this meowjestic king walking around the place. We'd tell him to get on the bed so that we could wash the floor, he would say no, and we would be doomed to dirty floors for eternity because we would be unable to refuse him.
